# File lib/celerity/browser.rb, line 179
    def text
      return '' unless @page

      if @page.respond_to?("getContent")
        string = @page.getContent.strip
      elsif @page.documentElement
        string = @page.documentElement.asText.strip
      else
        string = ''
      end

      # Celerity::Util.normalize_text(string)
      string
    end
